subject: Unclaimed Funds
body:
Office of the New York State Comptroller - Unclaimed Funds

Attn:  Scott

It is my pleasure to write to you to inform you that we are working with the US and British settlement office on compensation and Unclaimed funds, your name was listed among beneficiaries that have been approved for compensation of your Unclaimed Fund. The total amount US$10.5Million has been approved in your name as a means of compensating you for an overdue payment which you have been waiting for a long time. 

The United States Government and British Government have mandated that a compensation Bonus should be rewarded to you for waiting so long to receive your fund without no result, we have made our calculation and we found out that you have been waiting to receive your fund for more than 2yrs now and the new law says any beneficiary whose fund has not been transferred for the past 2yrs will be compensated so you are qualified.

I will want you to kindly send the following information as stated below for documentations and approval for release of your compensation fund,

1). Your Full name 
2). Your Address
3). Your Mobile-------Home Phone--------------Fax Numbers--------
4). Your Age and Occupation
5). Your Bank Name----Bank Address---Account Number-----Routing--------Swift Code-------Account Name-------

Please you are advised to send this information urgently for approval notification and immediate processing of your US$10.5Million.
 
I will be waiting for your urgent reply. 

Yours Faithfully
 
Thomas P. DiNapoli
Controller Office of Unclaimed Funds
